english.segment1: VERSE 1. Sanctify me. Clean out my closet. Take away anything. That is not pleasing to You
english.segment2: Purify me. Destroy all my anger. Wash away everything. That is not pleasing to You
english.segment3: CHORUS. I will be white as snow. I will be pure as gold. Jesus my heart must know. I'm pleasing to You
english.segment4: I give my life my all. Taking the cross I will follow. Jesus my heart must know. I'm pleasing to You
english.segment5: VERSE 2. Sanctify me. You are the light to guide me. To the place where I am. Only pleasing to You
english.segment6: Oh come and Purify me Lord. I need your light inside me. So the darkness flees. And I can be pleasing to You
